Import Procedure
Here I am importing some data.

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(haven)

airline <- read_sas("http://www.principlesofeconometrics.com/sas/airline.sas7bdat", NULL)
golf <- read_sas("http://www.principlesofeconometrics.com/sas/golf.sas7bdat", NULL)

airline
```

Data wrangle
Here I am cleaning up the data.

```{r}
airline %>%
 filter(Y >= 6.2 & Y <= 23.8) %>%
 ggplot() +
 aes(x = W, y = Y) +
 geom_point(size = 1L) +
 scale_color_hue() +
 theme_minimal()
```
